name: 2048 Balls: Merge Magic Bubble
description:
welcome to the Newest 2048 Ball and Merge Megic Bubble game! The most fun and interesting 2048 puzzle game disigned by HHS Daily.
2048 - Merge Bubble! In this innovative puzzle game , Before the ball hits the bottom line, synthesize higher-level numbers as fast as possible! What are you waiting for, download the game now, and score higher than anyone else with 2048 game lovers!.... contiue merging new elements to explore in more themes, to grow your farm enven further! Oh! Can't wait! Hurry up download it and let the farm grow in your hand.

Let me introduce the game feature for you:
- Free to play.
- Retains the most classic 2048 number mode.
- Brand new designs of game themes.
- Brand new designs of merge items.
- Relaxed and lively game BGM.
- Smooth gaming experience.
- Flay with 2048 fans all over the world.

▼ Simple game rules
- Swipe the screen in four directions to merge two same low-level elements into a new high-level element.
- Each game theme has 14 levels of elements. Reach level 11(2048) to unlock new thems.

Download and join the 2048 world now! Start exploring and see how great you will be.
Any feedback please email us: casinocard@hotmail.com
